resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: asAtDate
options.description: Returns the stock on hand for a specific date

options.name: IsAssembled
options.description: Whether the AvailableQty will also include the quantity that can be assembled

options.name: modifiedSince
options.description: Returns stock on hand values modified after a specific date

options.name: orderBy
options.description: Orders the list by a specific column, by default the list is ordered by productCode

options.name: productId
options.description: Returns products with the specific Product Guid. You can enter multiple product IDs separated by commas.

options.name: warehouseCode
options.description: Returns stock on hand for a specific warehouse code

options.name: warehouseName
options.description: Returns stock on hand for a specific warehouse name

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'salesOrder' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'salesOrder' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'salesOrder' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'stockOnHand' THEN SHOW parameter 'productId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'stockOnHand' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'stockOnHand' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'stockOnHand' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
